# loading packages


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load( tidygraph, ggraph,
                jsonlite, SmartEDA,
                tidyverse)
```
:::



# importing data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
kg <- fromJSON("data/MC1_graph.json")
```
:::




# Inspect structure


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
str(kg, max.level = 1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
List of 5
 $ directed  : logi TRUE
 $ multigraph: logi TRUE
 $ graph     :List of 2
 $ nodes     :'data.frame':	17412 obs. of  10 variables:
 $ links     :'data.frame':	37857 obs. of  4 variables:
```


:::
:::



# Initial EDA



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
nodes_tbl <- as_tibble(kg$nodes)
edges_tbl <- as_tibble(kg$links)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = edges_tbl,
       aes(y = `Edge Type`))+
  geom_bar()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex04_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = nodes_tbl,
       aes(y = `Node Type`))+
  geom_bar()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex04_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


# step1 mapping from node id to row index


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
id_map <- tibble(id=nodes_tbl$id,
                 index = seq_len(
                   nrow(nodes_tbl)
                 ))
```
:::



# step 2 map source and target IDs to row indices



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
edges_tbl <- edges_tbl %>%
  left_join(id_map , by = c("source" = "id")) %>%
  rename(from = index) %>%
  left_join(id_map, by=c("target" = "id")) %>%
  rename(to = index)
```
:::





# step 3 filter out any unmatched



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
edges_tbl <- edges_tbl %>%
  filter(!is.na(from),!is.na(to))
```
:::



# step 4 creating the graph


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
graph <- tbl_graph(nodes = nodes_tbl,
                   edges = edges_tbl,
                   directed = kg$directed)
```
:::



# Visualising the knowledge graph



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(1234)
```
:::



#Visualising the whole graph



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggraph(graph, layout = "fr") +
  geom_edge_link(alpha = 0.3,
                 colour = "gray") +
  geom_node_point(aes(color = `Node Type`),
                  size = 4) +
  geom_node_text(aes(label = name),
                 repel = TRUE,
                 size = 2.5) +
  theme_void()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex04_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::




#### Step 1 : Filter edges to only "Memberof"



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
graph_memberof <- graph %>%
  activate(edges) %>%
  filter(`Edge Type` == "MemberOf")
```
:::



# step2 Extract only connected nodes


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
used_node_indices <- graph_memberof %>%
  activate(edges) %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  select(from, to) %>%
  unlist() %>%
  unique()
```
:::



# step 3 



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
graph_memberof <- graph_memberof %>%
  activate(nodes) %>%
  mutate(row_id = row_number()) %>%
  filter(row_id %in% used_node_indices) %>%
  select(-row_id)  #optional cleanup
```
:::




# step 4


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggraph(graph_memberof, layout = "fr") +
  geom_edge_link(alpha = 0.5, colour = "gray") +
  geom_node_point(aes(color = `Node Type`), size = 1) +
  geom_node_text(aes(label = name), repel = TRUE, size = 2.5) +
  theme_void()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex04_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-16-1.png){width=672}
:::
